text:
JUSTIN Bieber made an inspired improvisation when he forgot the lyrics to his hit song Despacito during a nightclub performance - replacing the word with Dorito and burrito.

The pop star, 23, looked happy, albeit a little worse for wear, as he sang along to the track by Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankee on which he features.

4 Justin Bieber made an inspired improvisation when he forgot the lyrics to his hit song Despacito during a nightclub performance Credit: Slayingwithjb/Twitter

Admitting to the rowdy audience that he didn't know the words to the track, he sang: "I don't know the words so I say Dorito... I don't know the words so I say burrito" as the bemused crowd watched on.

At one point he awkwardly held out the microphone to a reveller who also admitted he didn't know the lyrics.

Just days ago, Justin declared himself a true Harry Styles fan after gushing over the One Direction star.

4 The pop star, 23, looked happy, albeit a little worse for wear Credit: SlaywithJb / Twitter

The Sorry singer approved of 23-year-old Hazza’s recent Carpool Karaoke alongside British comedian James Corden, 38.

And Biebs also expressed joy over Harry’s debut self-titled solo album – which has already romped to the top of the British album charts.

4 At one point he awkwardly held out the microphone to a reveller who also admitted he didn't know the lyrics Credit: Slay with jb/Twitter

MOST READ IN TV & SHOWBIZ Exclusive TV STAR DEAD TV host Emily Hartridge, 35, killed in electric scooter crash near her home Exclusive WON'T CONTROL HIS FURY Tommy Fury's ex warns Molly-Mae he's ‘aggressive & will cheat' ‘LIFE WASN’T WORTH LIVING’ Anthea Turner’s sister was 'homeless' amid cash row with sibling Exclusive FLACK ATTACKED Love Island's Francesca called Caroline Flack a ‘dirty paedo’ to her face BLUE'S THAT GIRL Christine McGuinness looks sensational in blue bikini poolside in Spain PRICE OF FAME Ed Sheeran says he's cut off all but FOUR pals due to his crippling anxiety

Taking to Instagram on Friday, he shared a photograph of Harry’s Carpool Karaoke that he was clearly watching on YouTube.

“Just watched Harry styles carpool karaoke!! Hilarious!” Justin wrote alongside the image.

Proving himself a true Styles fan, he added: “Also congrats on the album, it sounds great!”

4 Justin's fans have begged him to cancel his upcoming UK tour dates in the wake of the Manchester terror attack Credit: Splash News

Meanwhile Justin's fans have begged him to cancel his upcoming UK tour dates in the wake of the Manchester terror attack.

The Sorry singer is due to play a number of dates around the country over the summer, including a headline set at the British Summertime Festival in London’s Hyde Park on July 2.

title: Justin Bieber looks worse for wear as he forgets the words to his hit Despacito and instead sings about Doritos
